=== Current Issues ===
Needed to use -noapic -nolapic for a correct installation with Gutsy 7.10

Wifi card not detected. I had to use ndiswrapper, but not all the times it works.
http://espaciodetrabajo.wordpress.com/2007/09/11/ubuntu-y-hp-pavilion-dv6420la-notebook-bcm4310-uart-rev-02/
